body.name: LED Desk Lamp, Remote Control Computer Desk Light Bright Desktop Light 100 Lighting Modes Dimmable Clamp Desk Lighting for Home Office Dorm with Adjustable Gooseneck, 24W, Double Head, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 39 mins
features: 100 Light modes & Wide Light Range: APMIEK LED desk lamp, 168 light beads, 24W, 900Lm,100 lighting modes (10 color temperature, 2700K-6500K, 10 brightness+/-, 10%-100%), 27.5 light height, 72 inch ultra wide lighting range, eye-caring, handy for home or office.

Physical Button & Remote Control: APMIEK LED desk light, 3-meter intelligent remote control, switch conveniently to different modes (reading/working/coffee/feeding/gaming/night), special timing function (auto-dimming in 3h), smart memory (turn on with the same mode from last turning off).

Flexible Gooseneck & Groove Design: Soft Metal & Aluminum Material, sturdy enough to stay in place in any angle; 360 flexible gooseneck with groove to storage the cord, 180 adjustable lamp head, light you all around.

Clamp-on & Easy to Install: 3 steps to install, large metal clamp, working height 2.76 inch (7cm), fits well on desks, space saving and portable, practical for sewing/studying/painting/crafting/doing nails.

Energy Saving & Long Lifespan: 85% less energy consumption work lamp, 50000h long life span; adapter included,103 inch power cord; CRI(Ra)≧90, no flicker; 3-month of exchange or return policy, contact us for any problems.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: APMIEK Double Head LED Desk Lamp Super flexible and easy to control where the light will go in a wide area. It folds easily out of the way. The lights not only spread out, but they rotate so you can control where the light goes on the table or facing out. This is great for tables but also works great for an easel.

APMIEK LED Clamp Desk Light 100 Lighting Modes & Special Cord Storege Groove Design 10 Color Temperature 2700K-6500K (long press increase/decrease steplessly)10 Brightness Levels 10%-100% (long press increase/decrease steplessly)360° flexiable gooseneck with groove to storage the cord

APMIEK LED Architect Lamp Ultra Wide Lighting Range With 31.5 inch light head, light height 27.5 inch, 900Lm, APMIEK LED desk lamp can even cover a 72 inch long desk, which can light up your whole desk. Ideal for a multi-monitor workstation, large table for the home office, drawing, sewing, crafting, painting, reading.

APMIEK LED Dimmable Work Lamp with Remote Control both by Button and Remote The remote is easy to change the brightness as well as the color whether you prefer cool light or warm light. 6 Setting Modes reading/working/coffee/feeding/gaming/night mode, easy to change lighting color. Special Timing Function Auto-dimming to night mode in 3h, remind you that you have been working for 3 hours. Smart Memory Turn on with the same mode from the last turning off.

Automatic Heat Dissipation The maximum temperature is also within the human body's tolerance range. Soft Metal & Aluminum Material Sturdy, durable, flexible and stay in place at any angle. Practical Groove Design For storage the cord. Give you a neat and tidy desktop.

Sensitive Buttons Easy to control the lamp and also include the memory function which will back to the last lighting mode. Flexible Goose-Neck Super flexible and easy to control where the light will go in a wide area. High Color Rendering Index CRI≧90. No flicker. No glaring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Can't think of a thing this lamp is missing. It has numerous brightness settings, easy to install, looks fantastic and works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal light
reviews.reviewText: This is the best desk light I’ve ever had. Tall enough that it’s not in my face, flexible so I can adjust it so I never see the actual bulb if I don’t want to, I can change the light color to get the warm feel I want, simple buttons in the light, plus a remote (I personally don’t use the remote, and it clamps really tight to my desk surface with its metal clamp making it super stable. This really is an excellent product. Worth more than I paid for sure. I use it on my desk in my travel trailer when I’m working. It allows me to keep the lights low so my dog can sleep in, but it does get really bright too. 🐺🤣

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a three screen desk, lots of options.
reviews.reviewText: I hardly ever give something a five star rating because "I love it!" seems a bit much. But since 4 stars is "I like it" and I really like it, I'll give it 5. I have two big monitors and a laptop. This light attaches to the desk and arches up over the monitors. The arms can be moved horizontally to match the angle of the two bigger monitors and casts good light on the keyboard. The flexible goose neck is surprisingly sturdy and stable. I only bent it once to fit my rig, but it feels like it would handle frequent flexing pretty well. It's pretty bright and you can adjust the brightness and cool/warm tones. It has a remote, which I thought was going to be useless (I mean the lamp controls are less than 2 feet from my hands) but I don't have to reach my arm up in the middle of a call to adjust brightness and that's actually nice. It has six presets for morning (warm bright light), reading (blended warm and cool), working at your desk (more like daylight), gaming (really bright), for getting up to feed a baby (dim and warm) and night (very dim and warm). I'm surprised how much I use those functions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall the desk lamp is good. Very slim design and I appreciate all the different adjustment settings. The only thing that is making me nervous is neither I nor my husband can get the "head" onto the "neck" fully. So the head is on there very precariously! We have tried absolutely everything (including a rubber mallet!) and cannot get the thing to connect all the way. There is a gap that we can't close! It doesn't seem like anyone else is having this issue. All the other reviews I've seen shows the head smoothly connected to the neck. If anyone has any tricks! Let me know :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright, easy to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: Make sure to measure the thickness of whatever you are planning on clamping this to. My desk was a close call. The lamp is flexible and includes a cable path to hide those cables if you're not a fan of clutter. It is very bright if you want it to be but it can also shift into night mode whenever you are working late. The remote worked perfectly and was built well for the price. The setup took less than 3 minutes.

reviews.reviewerName: Love this!  Easy to install. Multiple settings and all are adjustable for brightness and heat.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Easy to install. Multiple settings and all are adjustable for brightness and heat level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've only had it mounted for 2 days, but it's sleek and bright. My 1st picture shows how streamlined it is even in front of my window. It doesn't block my view. The 2nd picture shows my desk without the light; it's just dark in my office and it's hard to read things on my desk. The 3rd picture shows my desk with the light on and how much light there is to read by. What a difference! It's so much easier on my eyes to have this light. I like how wide the bulbs are; it spans the whole middle half of my long desk. I like the different LED bulb settings; I don't like really warm or really cool lighting, so I use the "book mode button" on the remote...it's the perfect blend of cool/warm light for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very functional desk lamp
reviews.reviewText: Love the brightness levels and color possibilities. Very adaptable for positioning.Very poor instructions for setting up.

Die Lampe hält was sie verspricht und verfügt über alle wichtigen Funktionen. Sie macht einen recht wertigen Eindruck und man kann Helligkeits- und Kelvin-Wert in je 8 Stufen manuell, oder mit der Fernbedienung auch über Presets einstellen.Was man bedenken sollte:Normal installiert, kann die Lampe je nach Ausrichtung etwas blenden, oder sich im Bildschirm spiegeln, da sie sich baubedingt im Sichtfeld befindet. Man kann durch das Anbringen eines Klebebandes o. drgl. am Rand Abhilfe schaffen, aber mein Tipp wäre – und das funktioniert in meinem Setup prima: einfach die Lampen-Traverse verkehrt herum, mit Ausrichtung nach oben aufstecken und man erhält wunderbar diffuses Licht von oben. Allerdings muss dazu gesagt werden, dass die Lampe nicht besonders hell ist und diese Konfiguration, aufgrund der Leuchtkraft, nicht überall funktionieren dürfte.

Cette lampe est vraiment bien adapté pour le travail de bureau.Le réglage du support est top et vous permet de le mettre comme vous le désirez.Vous pouvez aussi la positionner selon votre désir.La gestion de luminosité et de type de luminosité est vraiment TOP.La télécommande est vraiment un plus.Cet éclairage est différent d'un éclairage plafond et fatigue moi les yeux devant les écrans.Je conseil ce produit.

La lampada arriva in questa confezione di cartone,all'interno ulteriormente imballata in una confezione di plastica con il manuale d'istruzioni.Si presenta bella,moderna e fatta bene. È una lampada principalmente da scrivania,ma potete posizionarla ovunque voi vogliate.Si aggancia alla scrivania tramite il morsetto integrato,per scrivanie massimo con spessore...ha un collo ruotabile a 360°,la lampada invece ruota di 180°<in modo da poter esser direzionata come meglio si crede...dispone di diverse modalità di luce,dieci per l'esattezza, e dieci intensità differenti,andando a riprodurre una luce più marcata per svolgere le nostre attività giornaliere o più delebile come punto luce.Rispetto a lampade tradizionali,consuma molto meno,(solamente 24 W)garantendo un risparmio non indifferente!Io la consiglio a tutti, è davvero bella.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ein richtig tolles Produkt, das hält, was es verspricht!
reviews.reviewText: Da ich beim Schreiben mit der Hand mit links schreibe, und meine alte Schreibtischlampe links von mir stand, weil rechts auf meinem Schreibtisch keine Platz ist, verdunkle ich mir beim Schreiben sozusagen die Sicht. Außerdem wollte ich sowieso mal etwas anderes/neues, und suchte nach einer flexiblen Lösung. Hab' diese Lampe auf der ersten Seite der Suchergebnisse gefunden und als erste Entscheidung bestellt. Sie kam auch ziemlich schnell bei mir an. Die Montage war total einfach, aller Teile der Lampe einfach zusammenstecken und mit den Schrauben festmachen; vorher den Fuß am Schreibtisch festklemmen. Die vordefinierten Leucht-"Profile" auf der Fernbedienung sind spitze, genauso toll wie das manuelle Einstellen der Farbtemperatur und der Helligkeit. Schön hätte ich gefunden, wenn für den Preis vielleicht noch zwei Batterien für die Fernbedienung dabeigewesen wären. Die einzige Kleingkeit ist, dass man mit der Fernbedienung ziemlich genau in Richtung Lampe zeigen muss. Ansonsten kann ich die Lampe auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen, sie ist definitiv ihr Geld wert!

reviews.reviewTitle: tante personalizzazioni ed un comodo telecomando
reviews.reviewText: Lampada da tavolo con morsa, due bracci regolabili e telecomando.Il prodotto arriva contenuto all'interno di una scatola di cartone ed è arrivato in perfette condizioni.È una lampada da scrivania dotata di morsa che posiziono al bordo del tavolo fissandola facilmente, risparmiando spazio ed evitando rovinose cadute della lampada stessa.È dotata di collo a cigno, quindi posso piegarla opportunamente in qualsiasi direzione, i due bracci luminosi possono essere piegati ciascuno a 90 gradi, quindi possiamo unirli, oppure allontanarli il più possibile e creare una luce a 180 gradi che possa illuminare gran parte della scrivania.È dimmerabile, ovvero aumentare o diminuire la potenza e posso gestire la temperatura tra un bianco caldo, un bianco freddo e degli intermedi.È presente un telecomando per gestirla senza nemmeno alzarmi dalla poltrona.La mia esperienza col prodotto è positiva, il telecomando mi permette di gestirla anche senza alzarmi dalla sedia, perfetto per noi pigrone/i! È una lampada comoda e facile da utilizzare, le personalizzazioni sono parecchie, posso gestire la potenza, ma anche il colore, tra toni freddi e caldi che creano atmosfera e si adattano all'uso più opportuno. La struttura è comoda, col collo a cigno che si piega a nostro piacimento e con la morsa, comodissima per tenerla fissa, senza cadute e sprechi di spazio.La qualità dei materiali l'ho trovata molto soddisfacente.CONFEZIONE: 5/5MATERIALI: 5/5MANIFATTURA: 5/5UTILIZZO: 5/5ESTETICA: 4,5/5PUNTO FORTE: telecomando incluso.PUNTO DEBOLE: nessuno.
